#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int maxq=-1,val,minq=2000000000,n,a,t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>a;
        if(a%6)
         cout<<"Chef\n";
        else
         cout<<"Misha\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
